text: Jannis Kounellis (; 24 March 1937 - 16 February 2017) was a Greek-Italian contemporary artist. He was a painter and sculptor. He moved to Rome in 1956. He was best known for his work during the Arte Povera movement in the 1960s. He had art exhibitions in cities including Rome, London, New York City, Athens, Herning and Berlin. He was born in Piraeus. Kounellis died on 16 February 2017 in Rome, at the age of 80. ==Related pages== * List of Italian painters ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Greek people Category:Italian sculptors Category:Italian painters
title: Jannis Kounellis
